page.title: 19CLUBS IN NANTGLYN.
page.content: The Young Farmers meetings are the major entertainment for the under 2o's. Most of the 57 members are Welsh speaking and they come from villages up to 8 miles away. Winter meetings are held every week with slide shows, sports events and quizes. The group organises the Nantglyn Show. Last year some members went on an exchange visit to the USA and Canada. Merched y Wawr, the main women's group has monthly all Welsh meetings.The 3o members come from Denbigh,Peniel,Saron and Nantglyn; more young members are needed. Popular activities are fashoin shows whist drives and events to raise money for the local hospital. The Community Council holds monthly meetings in Welsh.Nantglyn won an award this year in the Best Kept Village Competition.
